title: Open Educational Practices and Care Pedagogy in Online Learning During the Pandemic Era

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of adult education and online learning environments
context.additional_context: A social competency enhancement course for current professionals, supporting flexible learning environments via mobile devices. Evaluates practical application skills through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can design online learning modules based on Open Educational Practices (OEP) principles
Learners can design learner-centered educational experiences by applying care- and cognitive empathy-based teaching methods
Learners can develop and apply Open Educational Practices (OEP) case studies through project-based assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
